desc: Hello,I'm doing a project about people who win the lottery.I would have a special project that would require the following:8 photos (either selfies or someone else taking pictures of you)1. picture of you looking bored2. picture of you being happy big smile4. picture of you with 2 thumbs up5. picture of you with your hands in the air, celebrating6. picture of you holding your phone and pointing to it looking super happy7. picture of you, print out the attached certificate. print it out. Hold the certificate and look super happy.  (see attachement)8. Picture of you looking super sad, like crying. Maybe holding your head.I'm willing to pay $2 per [url removed, login to view] needs to look natural. Please take the picture inside your house, with good natural lighting. Make sure the framing of the picture is good and your face is not cut out.You can take the picture with your phone. If we are satisfied with the quality of the pictures, we will order more.5 videos1. You dancing in celebration saying stuff like: "I'm so happy, I won. Wohooo" Needs to feel genuine. Put your hand in the air. Jump around. Like you're the happiest person in the world. "I can't believe it, this is amazing". Imagine like you've just won the lottery.2. Have a lot of dollar bills (the more the better). Look happy, in celebration and throw the money up in the air. You can throw a few bills (could be Canadian money, Euros, or American) at the camera3. A different version of #2. Just through more money, rub it on you. Just look happy and play with the money.4. This is a "reaction video" . Watch this clip on your computer: [url removed, login to view]From 1:30 to 1:45.  React as if you were playing and you just won 1 million dollars. Just go crazy, like you can't believe it and you're so happy.5. This time you talk directly to the camera. You can record yourself, just make sure it's not shaky and is filmed horizontally. Look super happy, in shock and grateful. Say "Wow this has been incredible. I hit the 1 million jackpot, thank you so much Grand Mondial. I was playing for 2 minutes on my phone and wow." you can improvise as well for the lines, needs to look super natural.All the clips must be around 15 seconds. The camera must not be shaky. Please send in mp4 format, filmed horizontally. The video must be well lit so we can easily see what's happening. Needs to look realisitc.I'm willing to pay $15 per video. Once again, if we are satisfied, we will order plenty more.
title: Take pictures of yourself + Film videos of yourself
